title.rendered: Yellow Paper Released: Event Driven Approach and Blockchain in Logistics

content.rendered:
The awaited yellow paper (PDF):

Ihor Pidruchny, Tanya Bahrynovska_ Event Driven Blockchain based Approach to Automation in Logistics and Trucking Industry

is available for open download.

Table of Contents:

  1. Author’s Connection to U.S Trucking Industry
  2. Logistics & Trucking Industry Overview
  3. State of Software Market in U.S Trucking Industry
  4. Software Adoption in U.S Trucking Industry
  5. General Problems of Software Design and Deployment
  6. Complexity of Industry Domain
  7. Domain Driven Design
  8. Event Sourcing as a Concept
  9. Lagom Event-Sourced Frameworks
  10. Event Storing for Trucking Domain
  11. Blockchain in Logistics and Trucking
  12. Blockchain Parameters for Trucking Industry
  13. Key Blockchain Parameters
  14. Consensus Protocol for Logistics
  15. PoS (Proof of Stake)
  16. Parameters for Proof of Stake Reward Algorithm
  17. Maturity of activity on the blockchain
  18. Business Reputation
  19. Business Cooperativeness
  20. PoA (Proof of Authority)
  21. AI-Driven Reward
  22. Deployment of Blockchain
